mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sys_role_authority(role_id, authority_id) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{authorityId})
mapper.select:
SELECT auth.* FROM sys_authority AS auth
INNER JOIN sys_role_authority AS ra ON ra.authority_id = auth.id
AND ra.role_id = #{roleId}
AND LOCATE(#{condition.name}, auth.name) > 0
ORDER BY auth.id ASC
